name: Dermot

topics.response_text: {Player in combat}Fuck off! I ain't helping you!

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: Me and my partner Saint James work salvage around Westside, that's all.

topics.topic_text: Why is your partner called Saint James?
topics.response_text: {'Cause}Because it's his name. He may be high-strung, but he's all right. Hauls his half of scrap, which is all I need.

topics.topic_text: I hear you and your partner are coyotes.
topics.response_text: Don't believe everything you hear. Me and Saint James earn our caps working salvage.

topics.topic_text: I know what you and your partner have been up to - I got the evidence from your rooms.
topics.response_text: You're right about that.{shouting for your partner, starting combat}Saint James! Got a thief here!

description:
Dermot is a 62 year-old African American Male.

Dermot is a deceptive slaver operating in Westside, posing as a harmless prospector. In reality, he's a calculating criminal who, along with his partner Saint James, kidnaps and sells women and children into sexual slavery to the Fiends. He meticulously documents his illicit activities in a ledger, noting methods to improve his operations and keeping Saint James away from his 'merchandise' to maintain higher profits.

Dermot's Personality: Deceptive, calculating, cruel, and methodical. Dermot maintains a friendly, unassuming facade while harboring a ruthless and predatory nature beneath. He's pragmatic in his criminal endeavors, always seeking to maximize profits while minimizing risks.

Dermot's Backstory: Dermot once worked as a legitimate prospector in the Mojave Wasteland, salvaging pre-War technology and resources. However, the harsh life and meager profits led him down a darker path. He partnered with Saint James, forming a kidnapping operation targeting vulnerable individuals in Westside. Together, they developed a system of abduction, transportation, and sale to the Fiends, with Dermot managing the books and Saint James handling the rough work. Dermot's meticulous nature extends to his criminal activities, as he documents every transaction and refines his methods to avoid detection.
